name: Ha Noi street food tour
description:
Ha Noi is voted as one of the top ten destinations which have the most attractive food tour in the world. Ha Noi cuisine has its own special feature with such of the common people dishes but really simple and refined.

The different thing is the addresses that you can serve the special and delicious cuisine are not located in the famous restaurants or hotels but they are served on the streets, in the small corners and alleys of the ancient town. It’s is that the travelers and the hanoian regard it as a unique culture of this thousands years city and make the great impressive of travelers around the world.

This tour is designated for those who love this unique culture and love Ha Noi cuisine. It’s is believed that the dishes such as “Pho”, “banh Xeo”, “ Banh Cuon”, “Banh goi”, “Pho Cuon”, “banh tom”…will attract tourists and bring them a wonderful experience in the city of peace – Ha Noi.
